=========

æè¿°

**GraphEdit** æä¾›äº†ç”¨äºå¯¹å„ç§å›¾è¿›è¡Œåˆ›å»ºã€æ“ä½œã€æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„å·¥å…·ã€‚å®ƒåœ¨å¼•æ“ä¸­çš„ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„æ˜¯é©±åŠ¨å¯è§†åŒ–ç¼–ç¨‹ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚å¯è§†åŒ–ç€è‰²å™¨ï¼Œä½†ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

\ **GraphEdit** æœ¬èº«åªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºå®¹å™¨ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥æ”¾ç½® :ref:`GraphNode<class_GraphNode>` çš„æ— é™æ …æ ¼ã€‚æ¯ä¸ª :ref:`GraphNode<class_GraphNode>` ä»£è¡¨å›¾ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ˜¯è¿æ¥æ–¹æ¡ˆä¸­çš„å•ä¸ªæ•°æ®å•å…ƒã€‚è€Œ **GraphEdit** åˆ™æœ‰åŠ©äºæ§åˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´çš„å„ç§äº¤äº’ã€‚å½“ç”¨æˆ·å°è¯•è¿æ¥ã€æ–­å¼€æˆ–åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`GraphNode<class_GraphNode>` æ—¶ï¼Œ\ **GraphEdit** ä¸­ä¼šå‘å‡ºå¯¹åº”çš„ä¿¡å·ï¼Œä½†é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ä¸æ‰§è¡Œä»»ä½•åŠ¨ä½œã€‚ä½¿ç”¨æ­¤æ§ä»¶çš„ç¨‹åºå‘˜è´Ÿè´£å®ç°å¿…è¦çš„é€»è¾‘ï¼Œæ¥ç¡®å®šåº”å¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ã€‚

\ **æ€§èƒ½ï¼š**\ å¼ºçƒˆå»ºè®®åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ GraphEdit æ—¶å¯ç”¨ä½å¤„ç†å™¨ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆè§ :ref:`OS.low_processor_usage_mode<class_OS_property_low_processor_usage_mode>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

å½“è¯¥ **GraphEdit** æ•è· ``ui_graph_delete`` åŠ¨ä½œï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸º :kbd:`Delete`\ ï¼‰æ—¶è§¦å‘ã€‚

\ ``nodes`` æ˜¯åº”è¢«ç§»é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åç§°çš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚è¿™äº›é€šå¸¸åŒ…æ‹¬æ‰€æœ‰é€‰å®šçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

.. _class_GraphEdit_signal_disconnection_request:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**disconnection_request**\ (\ from_node\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, from_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, to_node\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, to_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_disconnection_request>`

å½“è¯•å›¾ç§»é™¤ ``from_node`` :ref:`GraphNode<class_GraphNode>` çš„ ``from_port`` å’Œ ``to_node`` :ref:`GraphNode<class_GraphNode>` çš„ ``to_port`` ä¹‹é—´çš„è¿æ¥æ—¶å‘å‡ºã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_signal_duplicate_nodes_request:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**duplicate_nodes_request**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_duplicate_nodes_request>`

å½“è¯¥ **GraphEdit** æ•è· ``ui_graph_duplicate`` åŠ¨ä½œï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸º :kbd:`Ctrl + D`\ ï¼‰æ—¶è§¦å‘ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¯¥ä¿¡å·æŒ‡ç¤ºåº”è¢«å¤åˆ¶çš„æ‰€é€‰çš„ :ref:`GraphElement<class_GraphElement>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**end_node_move**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_end_node_move>`

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_signal_frame_rect_changed:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**frame_rect_changed**\ (\ frame\: :ref:`GraphFrame<class_GraphFrame>`, new_rect\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_frame_rect_changed>`

Emitted when the :ref:`GraphFrame<class_GraphFrame>` ``frame`` is resized to ``new_rect``.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_signal_graph_elements_linked_to_frame_request:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**graph_elements_linked_to_frame_request**\ (\ elements\: :ref:`Array<class_Array>`, frame\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_graph_elements_linked_to_frame_request>`

Emitted when one or more :ref:`GraphElement<class_GraphElement>`\ s are dropped onto the :ref:`GraphFrame<class_GraphFrame>` named ``frame``, when they were not previously attached to any other one.

\ ``elements`` is an array of :ref:`GraphElement<class_GraphElement>`\ s to be attached.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**paste_nodes_request**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_paste_nodes_request>`

å½“è¯¥ **GraphEdit** æ•è· ``ui_paste`` åŠ¨ä½œï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸º :kbd:`Ctrl + V`\ ï¼‰æ—¶è§¦å‘ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¯¥ä¿¡å·æŒ‡ç¤ºåº”è¢«ç²˜è´´çš„å…ˆå‰å¤åˆ¶çš„ :ref:`GraphElement<class_GraphElement>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_signal_popup_request:

.. rst-class:: classref-signal

**popup_request**\ (\ at_position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_signal_popup_request>`

Emitted when a popup is requested. Happens on right-clicking in the GraphEdit. ``at_position`` is the position of the mouse pointer when the signal is sent.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_private_method__get_connection_line:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`PackedVector2Array<class_PackedVector2Array>` **_get_connection_line**\ (\ from_position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`, to_position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) |virtual| |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_private_method__get_connection_line>`

å¯ä»¥é‡å†™çš„è™šæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¦‚ä½•ç»˜åˆ¶è¿æ¥ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_in_input_hotzone:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **_is_in_input_hotzone**\ (\ in_node\: :ref:`Object<class_Object>`, in_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, mouse_position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) |virtual| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_in_input_hotzone>`

è¿”å› ``mouse_position`` æ˜¯å¦åœ¨è¾“å…¥çƒ­åŒºã€‚

é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œçƒ­åŒºæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`Rect2<class_Rect2>`\ ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­å¿ƒä½äº ``in_node``.\ :ref:`GraphNode.get_input_port_position<class_GraphNode_method_get_input_port_position>`\ (``in_port``)ï¼ˆå¯¹äºè¾“å‡ºçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¯·æ”¹ä¸ºè°ƒç”¨ :ref:`GraphNode.get_output_port_position<class_GraphNode_method_get_output_port_position>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚çƒ­åŒºçš„å®½åº¦æ˜¯ä¸»é¢˜å±æ€§ ``port_grab_distance_horizontal`` çš„ä¸¤å€ï¼Œé«˜åº¦æ˜¯ ``port_grab_distance_vertical`` çš„ä¸¤å€ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼Œä»¥å¸®åŠ©å…¥é—¨ï¼š

::

    func _is_in_input_hotzone(in_node, in_port, mouse_position):
        var port_size: Vector2 = Vector2(get_theme_constant("port_grab_distance_horizontal"), get_theme_constant("port_grab_distance_vertical"))
        var port_pos: Vector2 = in_node.get_position() + in_node.get_input_port_position(in_port) - port_size / 2
        var rect = Rect2(port_pos, port_size)
    
        return rect.has_point(mouse_position)

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_in_output_hotzone:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **_is_in_output_hotzone**\ (\ in_node\: :ref:`Object<class_Object>`, in_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, mouse_position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) |virtual| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_in_output_hotzone>`

è¿”å› ``mouse_position`` æ˜¯å¦åœ¨è¾“å‡ºçƒ­åŒºã€‚æœ‰å…³çƒ­åŒºçš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`_is_in_input_hotzone<class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_in_input_hotzone>`\ ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼Œä»¥å¸®åŠ©å…¥é—¨ï¼š

::

    func _is_in_output_hotzone(in_node, in_port, mouse_position):
        var port_size: Vector2 = Vector2(get_theme_constant("port_grab_distance_horizontal"), get_theme_constant("port_grab_distance_vertical"))
        var port_pos: Vector2 = in_node.get_position() + in_node.get_output_port_position(in_port) - port_size / 2
        var rect = Rect2(port_pos, port_size)
    
        return rect.has_point(mouse_position)

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_node_hover_valid:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **_is_node_hover_valid**\ (\ from_node\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, from_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, to_node\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, to_port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |virtual| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GraphEdit_private_method__is_node_hover_valid>`

å½“ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨æœ‰æ•ˆç«¯å£ä¸Šæ‹–åŠ¨è¿æ¥æ—¶ï¼Œè¯¥è™šæ‹Ÿæ–¹æ³•å¯ç”¨äºæ’å…¥é¢å¤–çš„é”™è¯¯æ£€æµ‹ã€‚

å¦‚æœè¿æ¥ç¡®å®æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ï¼›å¦‚æœè¿æ¥ä¸å¯èƒ½ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚å¦‚æœè¿æ¥æ˜¯ä¸å¯èƒ½çš„ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ä¼šæ•æ‰åˆ°è¯¥ç«¯å£ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸ä¼šå‘èµ·å¯¹è¯¥ç«¯å£çš„è¿æ¥è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

åœ¨è¯¥ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼ŒæŠ‘åˆ¶äº†ä¸åŒä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è¿æ¥ï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    func _is_node_hover_valid(from, from_port, to, to_port):
        return from != to

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    public override bool _IsNodeHoverValid(StringName fromNode, int fromPort, StringName toNode, int toPort)
    {
        return fromNode != toNode;
    }

è¿”å›åˆ°å±å¹•ç©ºé—´ä¸­ç»™å®šç‚¹çš„æœ€è¿‘è¿æ¥ã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨ ``max_distance`` åƒç´ å†…æœªæ‰¾åˆ°è¿æ¥ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ç©ºçš„ :ref:`Dictionary<class_Dictionary>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_GraphEdit_theme_color_activity:

æ ¹æ®è¿æ¥çš„æ´»åŠ¨å€¼æ’å…¥è¿æ¥çº¿çš„é¢œè‰²ï¼ˆè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`set_connection_activity<class_GraphEdit_method_set_connection_activity>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----
